summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4889 for the improvement of 47th Avenue West, from West Bertona Street to Emerson Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 56071 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
